narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This facility meets the minimum requirements for obtaining a Class "C" exhibitors license.  
The license fee of $30.00 should be sent to the following address:
USDA-APHIS Animal Care  
Building B, Mailstop #3W11
2150 Centre Avenue
Fort Collins, CO 80526-8117
The inspection and exit briefing conducted with the Program Director and the Facility Director.
The pre-licensing process must be completed within 90 days or the applicant will forfeit the application fee and must
wait 6 months to reapply. No regulated activity may be conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained.
